name: secureshield-hackathon
description: Multi-Layer Security Intelligence Platform for Hack36 9.0 Secure

scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join(process.cwd(),'build');const dest=path.join(process.cwd(),'..','build');try{fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true,force:true})}catch(e){}fs.renameSync(src,dest);"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.vercel-build: npm install && cd client && npm install && npm run build

author: Hack36 Team
